title: Saturn pointed type
content:
A friend of mine wants to know if there's a font that resembles this, either the outer or inner shapes would be helpful.   
   
 ![saturn](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174248im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/36536.jpg)   
   
Thanks, all.
author: cheshiredave

comments.content: [Hammerhead](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174248/http:/www.typeart.com/family.asp?FID=63&SID=9&CID=1) from TypeArt is in the style, at least for a TURN.

Thanks for the ideas -- I actually found one she liked that was somewhat close: Jim Parkinson's [Showcard Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174248/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/showcard-gothic/). Any closer ids will still be greatly appreciated.

No closer I think, but two more: Fonthead's [Blue Moon](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174248/http:/www.fonthead.com/fonts-vol3.html) and Brain Eater's [Butch Wax](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174248/http:/www.braineaters.com/largeview/largeview.html) (too small sample).
